column1: '''Scott Bennie''' is the author and game designer of ''[[The Lord of the Rings

column5: Vol. I] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 1 January 2011)</ref> ''[[The Lord of the Rings
column6: Vol. II: The Two Towers]]''<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/lotr2.html The Lord of the Rings

column9: Vol. I (SNES)]]''. He also worked for [[Decipher]] on ''[[The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Game]]''.
